refentry:
elements stepalternatives stepalternatives Element
stepalternatives &stepalternatives.purpose;
&stepalternatives.synopsis.gen; Description
Processing expectations
&stepalternatives.parents.gen; &stepalternatives.children.gen;
Attributes
performance
Performance specifies whether one of the step alternatives must be performed or if the whole set is optional. (In no case is more than one alternative performed.)
